name: Doki Doki Malignancy
storyline: Our team (Team BigG Hero 8) worked hard on this for two whole days. This may be the first mod ever created in the space of 48 hours by a team of more than 8 people. As you can see, we have new scenarios and magnificent things.
summary: Doki Doki Malignancy is a dark and exciting mod for Doki Doki Literature Club that delves into the themes of illness, loss and fighting the inevitable. When one of the club members receives a devastating diagnosis, the light and romantic atmosphere gives way to a deeply emotional storyline, exploring how each character deals with the fragility of life and the challenges of mortality.
